question: When is the United Nations Day celebrated across the world?
explanation:
United Nations Day is being celebrated on 24 October every year across the world, since 1948. It marks the anniversary of the entry into force in 1945 of the UN Charter.
The year 2020 also marks the 75th anniversary of the United Nations and its founding Charter. A declaration was adopted under the theme “The future we want, the United Nations we need: reaffirming our collective commitment to multilateralism”.
